title: Japan Today
text:
Posted in: Seeking favors, Trump asked Ukraine president to investigate Biden See in context

For the millionth time, why does JOE BIDEN care about a corrupt prosecutor in the Ukraine? Does he travel the world looking for corrupt prosecutors to fire? Why didnt he look in his own country first, plenty in the USA. Did he withhold aid from any OTHER country for having corrupt prosecutors? Or just the one where conveniently his son works?

lolololol For the millionth time, why does DONALD TRUMP care about a corrupt prosecutor in Ukraine? This all happened 5 years ago. Trump's been in office 2.5/3 years ago. I'm sure its just a coincide this all happened the day after the Mueller report was released? I'm sure its just a coincidence that he asked Ukraine to investigate the Democrat front runner. Totally a coincidence. ;)

To answer your question: Because we're talking about our tax dollars. Would you be happier if we just helicoptered money all over the place? riiiiggghhhhtttt

If Donny is so innocent, why won't he release the whistle blower report?
description: Japan news and Japanese national, crime, entertainment, politics, business, technology, sports stories in English. Features and analysis. 国内、海外、犯罪、娯楽、政治、経済、テクノロジー、スポーツ等、日本のニュースを英語でお届け。英語の勉強にも最適！日本のニュースを英語で読んでみよう。
